TMimePart.DefaultCharset
TMimePart     

property DefaultCharset: string;

Unit
MIMEpart

Description
Define default charset for decoding text MIME parts without charset specification.

Default value is 'ISO-8859-1' by RCF documents. But Microsoft Outlook use windows codings as default.

This property allows properly decode textual parts from some broken versions of Microsoft Outlook. (this is bad software!)


See also:
DecodePart, DecodePartHeader, EncodePart, EncodePartHeader, Charset
